name: Sylvetica
comment:
>>38642975

wall of stone crashes into you, Donnel, Nel, Andor, and Kainzo, and you hold it at bay, parrying with weapons and blocking with shields. Aelriss moves forward, thrusting at heads over your shoulders with her staff, while Tatsumaki can't seem to find an opening. You hear Donnel shout, and see a red mist in the air as he stumbles backwards. They're faster and stronger than you're used to, and you doubt they'll continue to push into your guard like this.

> Push forward, swinging at everything in sight.
> Fade back and attempt to gain the advantage.
> Concussive Strike, to try and make room.
> Guard Donnel.
> Duck low, and switch with Aelriss and Tatsumaki.
> Give an order. (Write-in)
